record.title: MEASURES INDEFINITELY POSTPONED--H. CON. RES. 172 AND H.R. 1154
record.narrative:
MEASURES INDEFINITELY POSTPONED--H. CON. RES. 172 AND H.R. 1154 -- (Senate - October 26, 2007)

[Page: S13493]

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that Calendar Nos. 241 and 409 be indefinitely postponed, en bloc.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
